auto-auth.help: Enable/disable NAC device auto authorization when discovered and nac-policy matched.
auto-auth.name: auto-auth

bounce-nac-port.help: Enable/disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port when NAC mode is configured on the port. Helps to re-initiate the DHCP process for a device.
bounce-nac-port.name: bounce-nac-port

options.help: Disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port when NAC mode is configured.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port when NAC mode is configured.
options.name: enable

inactive-timer.help: Time interval(minutes, 0 = no expiry) to be included in the inactive NAC devices expiry calculation (mac age-out + inactive-time + periodic scan interval).
inactive-timer.name: inactive-timer

link-down-flush.help: Clear NAC devices on switch ports on link down event.
link-down-flush.name: link-down-flush

options.help: Disable clearing NAC devices on a switch port when link down event happens.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable clearing NAC devices on a switch port when link down event happens.
options.name: enable

mode.help: Set NAC mode to be used on the FortiSwitch ports.
mode.name: mode

options.help: Local mode in which managed FortiSwitch port local settings is used.
options.name: local

options.help: Global mode which enables NAC on all the managed FortiSwitch ports.
options.name: global

onboarding-vlan.help: Default NAC Onboarding VLAN when NAC devices are discovered.
onboarding-vlan.name: onboarding-vlan

results.help: Configure integrated NAC settings for FortiSwitch.
results.name: nac-settings
